backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, vehicle tracking, notifications, admin‑gated invite code generation, and onboarding logic with authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence analysis.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for multiple frontend files describing their roles in authentication, layout, profile handling, admin tools, and PWA setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, base styles, and global color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app with PWA manifest, icons, and meta tags.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and locale settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching, fetch interception, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, and an authentication gate that manages profile loading and redirect behavior.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen for unauthorized access with optional first‑admin claim flow and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Displays a styled error card when user profile loading fails, showing error details and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Shows the application logo at configurable sizes using a static image asset.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with header and footer, conditionally showing navigation based on authentication and onboarding state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Provides a dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost with a required note and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Allows users to submit a report that a lost vehicle was found, including a required description.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Displays the main navigation header with user menu, mobile menu, and dynamic admin links.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Handles initiating a vehicle transfer via PIN verification and shows the resulting transfer code with copy link option.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A dialog prompting for a PIN, handling submission state and showing validation errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin‑related queries and mutations including checking admin status, claiming first admin, fetching system stats, invite codes, and registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles as lost or found with appropriate query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches user notifications with polling and provides a mutation to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding completion by submitting invite tokens and profile data, then refreshing the user profile cache.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Provides mutations to set up or update a user's PIN using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Retrieves caller profile based on inferred user role and exposes a stub mutation for profile updates, which are handled during onboarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Supports initiating and accepting vehicle transfers and invalidates related vehicle and user queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Fetches user and individual vehicle data and provides vehicle registration with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes with styling tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with app description, feature highlights, and admin contact links. Includes navigation back to home and presentation components.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Provides a form for entering a transfer code to accept vehicle ownership. Handles submission, validation, success navigation, and error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying system stats and navigation to manage invite tokens or view all vehicles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page that lists invite tokens, generates new ones, and allows copying onboarding links with admin-access checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with vehicle, lost vehicle, and notification stats plus quick-action buttons. Fetches user data and provides navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of reported lost vehicles with details and images. Supports filtering, loading state, and vehicle card rendering.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with timestamps and unread indicators. Allows marking notifications as read and handles loading and empty states.
Form for completing onboarding using an invite token and profile details. Submits data to create an account and navigates on success.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user’s profile info from hooks and shows Internet Identity details with logout support.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a new vehicle, including photo upload with progress tracking.
Allows users to create or update a security PIN used for vehicle ownership transfers.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a specific vehicle, its status, and actions like reporting lost or initiating transfer.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists all vehicles owned by the user with status badges and navigation to registration or details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records.
